title: Dyer's Record Book, 1861–74
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description:
Notebook with handwritten formulas for dyestuffs to be used for printing textiles.  Book contains 269 samples in various designs such as flowers, dots, stripes, squares, and circles.

Part of cover is missing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Dyer's Record Book, 1861–74.
1861–74. Medium: cardboard, paper, cotton. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-16.
